column9: An excellent restaurant with amen fully of top quality food.  Staff war every helpful when making a selection (especially with translation).  Recommend the Smoking Bulldog

column7: Nice place in the middle of Lund
column9: It was my favourite place where to go for lunch or dinner. The food was really nice and the service according with the food. I think you should to go if you visit Lund.

We stopped here for lunch because it was crowded. Sat outside on the square and had a nice lunch, pasta and Caesar salad. FYI, the salad was the only place I've experienced real, crisp bacon in all of Europe.

We where just passing trough Lund and needed lunch. Found this place in the centre of town and both the kids and I enjoyed it. The staff was very kind and helpful with our dog (we where seated outside). Without us asking they gave her...More
